Birgit (nke a makwaara dị ka Bergit, Birgid, Berguid) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia a na-asụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Chad
Ndị na-ekwu okwu dị na Moubi Goz Canton, Kouka Margni Sub-Prefecture na Moubi Zarga Canton, Mangalme Sub-Prefecture.
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Das Birgit eine osttschadische SpracheVokabular
Na: Gábor Takács (ed.), ọmụmụ ndị Ijipt na Semito-Hamitic (Afro-Asiatic): na memoriam W
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Nkọwa okwu na -U n'asụsụ ndị Chamito-Semitic
Na: Antoine Lonnet na Amina Mettouchi (ed.), Les langues chamito-semitiques (Afro-asiatiques), Mpịakọta nke 1, 650
Marti, Marianne, Calvain Mbernodji, na Katharina Wolf
Nnyocha mmekọrịta na asụsụ nke asụsụ Birguit - Kadjakse - Masmedje nke Chad
